Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
ui: reduce border radius for sharper, minimal corners

- Update theme tokens: reduce border radius values (sm:1px, md:2px, lg:2px, xl:3px)
- Update MUI global styles: set borderRadius to 2px for Paper, Card, Dialog
- Update all component-level borderRadius values across 20+ files
- Update dashboard "Generate Post" button with minimal corner radius
- Update base button styles in index.css to 2px

Creates a more modern, sharp aesthetic with subtle rounding throughout the UI.

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add 3-layer election law compliance system

- Add ELECTION_EXPRESSION_RULES to constants.js (stage-based rules)
- Inject election compliance instructions in policy-proposal.js (1st defense)
- Extend LEGAL_GUARDRAIL.json with election patterns (v1â†’v2)
- Add validateElectionCompliance() and sanitizeElectionContent() to election-compliance.js (2nd/3rd defense)
- Connect auto-sanitization in content-processor.js

Automatically replaces forbidden expressions based on user status:
- Stage 1 (ì¤€ë¹„/í˜„ì—­): "ê³µì•½"â†’"ì •ì±… ë°©í–¥", "ì•½ì†ë“œë¦½ë‹ˆë‹¤"â†’"ì´ ë°©í–¥ìœ¼ë¡œ ë…¸ë ¥í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add LLM-based quality validation for content generation

Replace heuristic repetition/density checks with LLM-powered semantic
analysis. The new evaluateQualityWithLLM function:

- Detects semantic repetition (same meaning, different words)
- Identifies low information density (abstract phrases, filler)
- Checks structural completeness (proper ending, no trailing content)
- Validates sentence completeness (no truncated sentences)

The LLM evaluation only runs after basic validations pass (name, length,
keywords) to minimize API costs. Failed validations now include AI-generated
suggestions for improvement in the retry prompt.

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
perf: optimize LLM quality validation for faster response

- Reduce evaluation prompt from 40+ lines to 8 lines
- Truncate content to 3000 chars max for validation
- Simplify JSON response structure
- Focus on 3 critical checks only:
  1. Sentence repetition
  2. Content after closing greeting
  3. Incomplete sentences

This prevents 504 timeout errors while maintaining quality checks.

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
